HPI 8069 Lancia Stratos HF Green

From black to eye-watering neon green. It's actually more subdued (if that's possible) in person so I'll blame the lighting. :lol: It looks like HPI just took a rally-spec Stratos and painted it green (note the fire extinguisher and racing harnesses).
